original_text: He hath made me also a byword of the people; and aforetime I was as a tabret.
korean_text: 하나님이 나를 백성의 속담거리가 되게 하시니 그들이 내 얼굴에 침을 뱉는구나

sentences.original_text: He hath made me also a byword of the people;
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 나를 또한 사람들의 속담거리로 삼았으며;

sentences.original_text: and aforetime I was as a tabret.
